::Sideswipe::
The body that once housed the spark of RebelYell rose
to its feet. Its optics flickered on. This was no
longer the body of RebelYell. It now belonged to the
revived Maximal Sideswipe. Sideswipe shook his head
from side to side, trying to throw off his feeling of
grogginess.He looked down at his sleek new black body.
"By the Matrix!" he said softly."What happened to me?"
The last thing he knew he was being blasted by
Megastorm. Now he found himself in a body that was not
his own.Just then he noticed the sound of weapons
fire.
He looked up. He recognized that ship. It was the Ark,
and it was under heavy attack. He picked up the chain
gun and laser rifle that were still lying on the
ground and rushed off to join the battle.
